help main.0: 0: New Geometry     - Specify the parameters of the antenna to use during the optimization process
help main.1: 1: Import Geometry  - Import an existing antenna geometry from a .json file to use during the optimization process
help main.2: 2: ~ Config Editor  - Opens the config editor
help main.3: 4: ~ Exit           - Exists the current instance of Irene

help ig.0: ~ {cancel}         - Exists the current antenna import process

help ng.0: 0: Frequency Range  - Specify the frequency range in which the antenna should operate
help ng.1: 1: Parameters       - Specify the parameters of the antenna such as Length, Width, Permitivitty, Height
help ng.2: 3: ~ Exit           - Exits the current antenna setup process

help op.0: 0: Start Optimization   - Starts the optimization process using the current configuration
help op.1: 1: ~ Edit Nat config    - Go to the config editor for the current instance of Nat
help op.2: 3: ~ Exit               - Exits the current optimization process without executing antenna optimization
